help-file.title: GAZE
help-file.content: The gaping empty sockets of the Dreadlord may be sightless, but its gaze contains something much more searching, disturbing and terrifying than most mortals may bear. To have the gaze of a Dreadlord upon you is to know true fear. Too petrified to move, your world ceasing and stopping as you struggle to free and turn away. The ability to gaze is dependant on the attribute power of the attacker. It is not crucial but will help subdue the victim.
